content:
PAVILION-real estate investment trust (REIT) surged to a three-year high yesterday as it resumed a growth trajectory after a quick breather.

The trust unit has resumed a rally with strong upward momentum seen in the slow-stochastic at 84 points and the RSI at 74 points.

The MACD histogram also posted steep growth to reflect the bullish momentum.

Resistance is pegged to RM1.63 and RM1.75, while support is found at RM1.37 and RM1.27.
